channel.title: Error - RSCD v25 [Help?]
channel.description:
Ok, I have all my settings setup properly. So, I run "run_lserver" - It all shows up properly, then I run "run_server", it begins to run properly, then it gives me an error about " java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: bind"
What file isn't working properly, and how do I fix?
Thanks in advance.
Does anyone know what would cause this error?
[code]Buildfile: build.xml
runserver: Buildfile: build.xml
runls: [java] Login Server starting up... [java] Connected to MySQL [java] LoginEngine now running [java] java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: bind [java] at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [java] at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) [java] at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [java] at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerN ew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [java] at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.access$80 0(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [java] at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$Worker.ru n(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [java] at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NamePreservin gRunnable.java:51) [java] at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [java] Java Result: 1
BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 2 seconds Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
